item.title: Winning the Culture War Through Christian Education ft. Kevin Swanson [Open Mike with Michael Thiessen]
item.description:
OPEN MIKE w/Michael Thiessen ~ July 13, 2024
In this conversation, Dr. Michael Thiessen interviews Kevin Swanson, the host of the Generations podcast, about the importance of homeschooling and family-based discipleship. They discuss the biblical foundation for homeschooling, the dangers of secular education, and the need for parents to take responsibility for their children's education. They also touch on the importance of the fear of God and the role of Christian classics in education. The conversation highlights the need for a return to a biblical worldview and a deeper understanding of the gospel. The conversation explores the fall of Western civilization and the potential for a revival. It discusses the impact of education on the fear and reverence of God, the breakdown of the family, and the division in the nation. The conversation also touches on the US presidential debate and the need for humility in America. It concludes with a discussion on the impending fall of civilization and the potential for a great awakening.
